Verses: 1 seeriya Raajaavin Padaiththalaivanaagiya Naagamaan Enbavan Than Aandavanidaththil Periya Manushanum Ennikkaiyullavanumaayirundhaan; Avanaik Kondu Karththar Seeriyaavukku Ratchippaik Kattalaiyittaar; Magaa Paraakkiramasaaliyaagiya Avano Kushtarogiyaayirundhaan.
2 seeriyaavilirundhu Thandugal Purappattu, Isravel Dhesaththilirundhu Oru Siru Pennai Siraipidiththukkonduvandhirundhaargal; Aval Naagamaanin Manaivikkup Panividai Seydhukondirundhaal.
3 aval Than Naachchiyaaraip Paarththu: En Aandavan Samaariyaavilirukkira Theerkkadharisiyinidaththil Povaaraanaal Nalamaayirukkum; Avar Ivarudaiya Kushtarogaththai Neekkividuvaar Endraal.
4 appozhudhu Avan Poi, Isravel Dhesaththup Pen Inna Inna Pragaaramaai Sollugiraal Endru Than Aandavanidaththil Ariviththaan.

5 appozhudhu Seeriyaavin Raajaa: Nalladhu Pogalaam, Isravelin Raajaavukku Nirubam Tharugiren Endraan; Appadiye Avan Than Kaiyile Paththuth Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum, Aaraayiram Sekkal Niraiponnaiyum, Paththu Maatruvasthirangalaiyum Eduththukkondupoi,

6 isravelin Raajaavidaththil Andha Nirubaththaik Koduththaan. Adhile: Indha Nirubaththai Ummidaththil En Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Naagamaan Konduvaruvaan; Neer Avan Kushtarogaththai Neekki Vida Avanai Ummidaththil Anuppiyirukkiren Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.

7 isravelin Raajaa Andha Nirubaththai Vaasiththapodhu, Avan Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu: Oru Manushanai Avan Kushtarogaththinindru Neekki Vidavendum Endru, Avan Ennidaththil Nirubam Anuppugiradharku, Kollavum Uyirppikkavum Naan Dhevanaa? Ivan Ennai Virodhikka Samayam Thedugiraan Enbadhai Sindhiththuppaarungal Endraan.

8 isravelin Raajaa Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkonda Seydhiyai Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Elisaa Kettapodhu, Avan: Neer Ummudaiya Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkolvaanen? Avan Ennidaththil Vandhu, Isravelile Theerkkadharisi Undenbadhai Arindhukollattum Endru Raajaavukku Solliyanuppinaan.
9 appadiye Naagamaan Than Kudhiraigalodum Than Radhaththodum Vandhu Elisaavin Vaasarpadiyile Nindraan.
10 appozhudhu Elisaa: Avanidaththil Aal Anuppi, Nee Poi, Yordhaanil Ezhudharam Snaanampannu; Appozhudhu Un Maamsam Maari, Nee Suththamaavaai Endru Sollachchonnaan.

11 adharku Naagamaan Kadunkobankondu, Purappattuppoi: Avan Veliye Vandhu Nindru, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhu, Than Kaiyinaal Andha Idaththaith Thadavi, Ivvidhamaaik Kushtarogaththai Neekkividuvaan Endru Enakkul Ninaiththirundhen.
12 naan Snaanampanni Suththamaagiradharku Isravelin Thanneergal Ellaavatraippaarkkilum Thamaskuvin Nadhigalaagiya Aapnaavum Parpaarum Nalladhallavo Endru Solli, Ukkiraththode Thirumbip Ponaan.

13 avan Oozhiyakkaarar Sameebaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Thagappane, Andhath Theerkkadharisi Oru Periya Kaariyaththai Seyya Umakku Solliyirundhaal Adhai Neer Seyveer Allavaa? Snaanam Pannum, Appozhudhu Suththamaaveer Endru Avar Ummode Sollum Podhu, Adhai Seyyavendiyadhu Eththanai Adhigam Endru Sonnaargal.
14 appozhudhu Avan Irangi, Dhevanudaiya Manushan Vaarththaiyinpadiye Yordhaanil Ezhudharam Muzhuginapodhu, Avan Maamsam Oru Sirupillaiyin Maamsaththaippola Maari, Avan Suththamaanaan.

15 appozhudhu Avan Than Koottaththodellaam Dhevanudaiya Manushanidaththukkuth Thirumbivandhu, Avanukku Munbaaga Nindru: Idho, Isravelilirukkira Dhevanaiththavira Boomiyengum Vere Dhevan Illai Enbadhai Arindhen; Ippodhum Umadhu Adiyen Kaiyil Oru Kaanikkai Vaangikkollavendum Endraan.
16 adharku Avan: Naan Vaangugiradhillai Endru Karththarukku Munbaaga Avarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endraan; Vaangavendum Endru Avanai Varundhinaalum Thattudhal Pannivittaan.

17 appozhudhu Naagamaan: Aanaalum Irandu Koveru Kazhudhaigal Sumakkaththakka Irandu Podhi Man Umadhu Adiyenukkuk Kattalaiyidavendum; Umadhu Adiyen Inik Karththarukke Allaamal, Anniya Dhevargalukku Sarvaanga Thaganaththaiyum Baliyaiyum Seluththuvadhillai.

18 oru Kaariyaththaiye Karththar Umadhu Adiyenukku Mannippaaraaga; En Aandavan Panindhukolla Rimmon Kovilukkul Pravesikkumpodhu, Naan Avarukkuk Kailaagu Koduththu Rimmon Kovilile Paniyavendiyadhaagum; Ippadi Rimmon Kovilil Naan Paniya Vendiya Indhak Kaariyaththaikkarththar Umadhu Adiyenukku Mannippaaraaga Endraan.
19 adharku Avan: Samaadhaanaththodepo Endraan; Ivan Purappattuk Konjadhooram Ponapodhu,

20 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Elisaavin Velaikkaaran Keyaasi Enbavan, Andha Seeriyanaagiya Naagamaan Konduvandhadhai En Aandavan Avan Kaiyile Vaangaamal Avanai Vittuvittaar; Naan Avan Pirage Odi, Avan Kaiyile Edhaagilum Vaanguven Endru Karththarudaiya Jeevanmel Aanaiyittu,
21 naagamaanaip Pin Thodarndhaan; Avan Than Pirage Odivarugiradhai Naagamaan Kandapodhu, Avanukku Edhirkondu Poga Radhaththilirundhu Kudhiththu: Sugaseydhiyaa Endru Kettaan.

22 adharku Avan: Sugaseydhidhaan; Theerkkadharisigalin Puththiraril Irandu Vaalibar Ippozhudhudhaan Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththilirundhu Ennidaththil Vandhaargal; Avargalukku Oru Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum, Irandu Maatruvasthirangalaiyum Tharavendum Endru Ketka, En Ejamaan Ennai Anuppinaar Endraan.

23 adharku Naagamaan: Dhayavuseydhu, Irandu Thaalandhai Vaangikkol Endru Solli, Avanai Varundhi, Irandu Thaalandhu Velliyai Irandu Kaigalil Irandu Maatru Vasthirangalode Katti, Avanukku Munbaaga Sumandhu Poga, Than Velaikkaararaana Irandu Permel Vaiththaan.
24 avan Mettandaikku Vandhapodhu, Avan Adhai Avargal Kaiyilirundhu Vaangi, Veettile Vaiththu, Andha Manusharai Anuppivittaan; Avargal Poivittaargal.
25 pinbu Avan Ulle Poith Than Ejamaanukku Munbaaga Nindraan; Keyaasiye, Engeyirundhu Vandhaai Endru Elisaa Avanaik Kettadharku, Avan: Umadhu Adiyaan Engum Pogavillai Endraan.

26 appozhudhu Avan Ivanaip Paarththu: Andha Manushan Unakku Edhir Konduvara Than Radhaththilirundhu Irangith Thirumbugirapodhu En Manam Unnudankooda Sellavillaiyaa? Panaththai Vaangugiradharkum, Vasthirangalaiyum Olivaththoppugalaiyum Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum Aadumaadugalaiyum Velaikkaararaiyum Velaikkaarigalaiyum Vaangugiradharkum Idhu Kaalamaa?

27 aagaiyaal Naagamaanin Kushtarogam Unnaiyum Un Sandhadhiyaaraiyum Endraikkum Pidiththirukkum Endraan; Udane Avan Uraindha Mazhai Niramaana Kushtarogiyaagi, Avan Samugaththai Vittup Purappattup Ponaan.
